column4: Last night I heard a pop inside my CPU case and my computer shut down. I figured it was the power supply so I bought another one. Still, no good. I tried everything and it turned out that the video card got fried in such a way that the computer doesnt turn on when the video card is in there. that pissed me off big time
it will be far worse ahard disk failure imho
they probably put the final version when ready in backports or even in updates
